entities.label: VCORE usage
entities.description: VCORE usage exceeded expected by 10%, reaching 82.6%
entities.source_text: VCORE 725mV 超過預期的10%使用率在82.6%

entities.label: MMDVFS
entities.description: MMDVFS data indicates it is not the cause of VCORE level increase
entities.source_text: 從 MMDVFS 的資料來看 都維持在 OPP4 代表主要不是從 MMDVFS 造成 VCORE 檔位的拉升

entities.label: DDR usage
entities.description: Combined DDR5460 and DDR6370 usage reached approximately 82.6%
entities.source_text: DDR5460跟DDR6370加起來的總使用率是達到82.6%左右

entities.label: DDR causing VCORE increase
entities.description: DDR usage appears to be causing the VCORE level increase
entities.source_text: 看起來是DDR造成 VCORE檔位拉升

entities.label: DDR voting mechanism
entities.description: DDR voting mechanism at DDR6370 potentially related to SW_REQ2
entities.source_text: 去看DDR 投票機制在DDR6370 有機會在SW_REQ2上

entities.label: CM
entities.description: CM is related to the cause of VCORE level increase
entities.source_text: 代表跟CM相關 所以去看下CPU部分

entities.label: CPU frequency settings
entities.description: CPU frequencies are at maximum settings: large core 2700MHz, medium core 2500MHz, small core 2100MHz
entities.source_text: 可以從CPU 的部份看到 大核2700MHz，中核2500MHz，小核 2100MHz 屬於都頂在天花板的設定上

entities.label: CM confirmed as cause
entities.description: CM is confirmed as the cause of the VCORE level increase
entities.source_text: 所以可以確認是因為CM造成拉檔的原因是確定的

relations.evidence: 所以可以確認是因為CM造成拉檔的原因是確定的

causal_effect.mechanism: CM affects the VCORE level directly, causing an increase in usage.

relations.evidence: MMDVFS的資料來看 都維持在OPP4代表主要不是從MMDVFS造成 VCORE檔位的拉升
DDR5460跟DDR6370加起來的總使用率是達到82.6%左右.看起來是DDR造成 VCORE檔位拉升.
所以可以確認是因為CM造成拉檔的原因是確定的
